id.description: 128 bit string identification of the client.

secret.title: secret used to authorize client with oauth2 server

logo_url.title: LogoUrl is url to logo of the client, should be 256x256 and lessthan 256KB

owner_id.title: owner id, could be Account or Agent

is_verified.title: IsVerified will be true if client is verified by the authority

redirect_urls.title: List of URLs which client must register for oauth redirection

is_internal.description:
Set if app is created or trusted by subiz,
the client will have privilenge to do any action.

is_public.description:
If this field setted to true, client is visible to any account, else,
only visible in owner account.

publish_date.description:
PublishDate, a RFC3339 date string show when have the client is
published.

is_confidential.description:
Clients capable of maintaining the confidentiality of their
credentials (e.g., client implemented on a secure server with
restricted access to the client credentials), or capable of secure
client authentication using other means.

close_timeout.title:
============= CHANNEL ONLY SECTION ======
conversations on this channel will be close if there
are no message pass in last ClosedTimeout seconds

clientClientType.title:
- STONE: STONE is just default value, client should never have Type is STONE
 - APP: APP is general client type
 - CHANNEL: CHANNEL is special client, that can and only listen chat topics of an account
 - BOT: BOT reserve for future

is_verified.title: IsVerified set if we know the url is controlled by webhook creator

Topics.title: Topics list of topics that will be sent to webhook

is_enabled.title: IsEnabled decide the webhook is being used or not
